## IOC variable

Global IOC container instance with async-safe initialization. Singleton pattern implementation to ensure only one container instance exists. Handles async scenarios properly to prevent race conditions.

  {<!-- -->Container<!-- -->}

**Signature:**

```typescript
IOC: IContainer
```
